query:
UPDATE dao_proposals SET
                description = $1,
                kind = $2,
                proposer = $3,
                status = $4,
                submission_time = $5,
                vote_counts = $6,
                votes = $7,
                total_votes = $8,
                dao_instance = $9,
                proposal_action = $10,
                tx_timestamp = $11,
                hash = $12
            WHERE id = $13
            RETURNING id
